name: 林敏勝
objective:
C語言，指標，結構，陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構
，排列，搜尋。
schedule:
Week 1,2   Basic Concepts
Week 3,4   Arrays and Structures
Week 5,6   Stacks and Queues
Week 7,8   Linked Lists
week 9     Midterm
Week 10,11 Trees
Week 12,13 Graphs
Week 14    Sorting
Week 15    Hashing
Week 16    AVL trees
Week 17    Multiway Search Trees
week 18    Final
scorePolicy:
Homework assignment 20%
Program assignments 20%
Midterm 30%
Final 30%
The midterm and final exams will be open books and open notes.
materials: Fundamentals of Data Structures in C, 2nd Edition, by Horowitz, Sahni, and Anderson-Freed, Silicon Press
